org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.axis
Class RangeAxis

java.lang.Object
  org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.axis.ValueAxis
      org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.axis.RangeAxis
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.timepedia.exporter.client.Exportable
public class RangeAxis
extends ValueAxis
implements org.timepedia.exporter.client.Exportable

A RangeAxis is an ValueAxis that represents values, typically on the y-axis.

drawAxis

public void drawAxis(XYPlot plot,
                     Layer layer,
                     Bounds axisBounds,
                     boolean gridOnly)
Description copied from class: ValueAxis
Draws the axis into the given layer, within the specified axisBounds, as well as drawing grid-lines on the given DefaultXYPlot.

Specified by:
drawAxis in class ValueAxis
Parameters:
plot - the plot to draw the gridlines into
layer - the layer to render the axis on
axisBounds - the bounds within the layer into which the axis should be drawn
gridOnly - if true, only render gridlines into the plots, render nothing else
